mission.posting: Client requires help with music files.

email.subject: Extreme Fan
email.body:
Hiya!
So, I need help retrieving some really sicks song from my favorite music artist, the problem is that these songs were only played once on a stream of his, and I really want them. I desire them so bad, 'cause I consider myself a huge fan of his and I love his music. Anyway, after digging and digging I got his IP, but I don't know what else to do from there, and I'm pretty sure he keep his songs on that computer, I want all the Unreleased files, I've linked you to his IP and your Dropbox, I want you to download the files and upload them to the Dropbox so I can download them from there.
